# viewWillAppear(_:)

**Instance Method**

Performs some action before the view appears.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor override dynamic func viewWillAppear(_ animated: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **animated**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view will appear using an animation.

## Responding to view controller events

- **loadView()**: Creates the view that the controller manages.
- **viewDidLoad()**: Performs some action after the system loads the view into memory.
- **viewDidDisappear(_:)**: Performs some action after the view disappears.
- **removeFromParent()**: Removes the view controller from its parent.
